ExternalServiceRegistration.description: The Entity Management API allows users to request Unclassified (“Public”), Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) “For Official Use Only” (FOUO) or CUI “Sensitive” entity data through several optional request parameters.
ExternalServiceRegistration.label: samGovEntitySearch
ExternalServiceRegistration.schema: {"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"samGovEntitySearch","description":""},"paths":{"":{"get":{"description":"Searches entities via several optional request parameters.","operationId":"Search Entity","parameters":[{"name":"ueiSAM","in":"query","description":"Unique Entity Identifier SAM. Allows a single 12-character value or up to 100 values. Example: ueiSAM=RV56IG5JM6G9","required":false,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"legalBusinessName","in":"query","description":"Allows partial or complete value search. Example: legalBusinessName=ALLTEL","required":false,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"cageCode","in":"query","description":"Allows a single 5-character value or up to 100 values. Example: cageCode=00000","required":false,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"dbaName","in":"query","description":"Allows Partial or Complete value. Example: dbaName=ALLTEL","required":false,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"api_key","in":"query","description":"API key from signing up through the SAM.gov website","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"dodaac","in":"query","description":"Allows 9 character value. Example: dodaac=DOD123456","required":false,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}],"responses":{"2XX":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"totalRecords":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"links":{"type":"object","properties":{"selfLink":{"type":"string"}}},"entityData":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"entityRegistration":{"type":"object","properties":{"ueiSAM":{"type":"string"},"ueiExpirationDate":{"type":"string"},"registrationStatus":{"type":"string"},"exclusionURL":{"type":"string"},"dodaac":{"type":"string"},"lastUpdateDate":{"type":"string"},"publicDisplayFlag":{"type":"string"},"samRegistered":{"type":"string"},"entityEFTIndicator":{"type":"string"},"cageCode":{"type":"string"},"dbaName":{"type":"string"},"evsSource":{"type":"string"},"registrationExpirationDate":{"type":"string"},"ueiCreationDate":{"type":"string"},"ueiStatus":{"type":"string"},"exclusionStatusFlag":{"type":"string"},"registrationDate":{"type":"string"},"legalBusinessName":{"type":"string"},"dnbOpenData":{"type":"string"},"purposeOfRegistrationDesc":{"type":"string"},"activationDate":{"type":"string"},"purposeOfRegistrationCode":{"type":"string"}}},"pointsOfContact":{"type":"object","properties":{"pastPerformanceAlternatePOC":{"type":"object","properties":{"firstName":{"type":"string"},"zipCode":{"type":"string"},"lastName":{"type":"string"},"middleInitial":{"type":"string"},"city":{"type":"string"},"countryCode":{"type":"string"},"addressLine1":{"type":"string"},"zipCodePlus4":{"type":"string"},"stateOrProvinceCode":{"type":"string"},"addressLine2":{"type":"string"},"title":{"type":"string"}}},"pastPerformancePOC":{"type":"object","properties":{"lastName":{"type":"string"},"zipCode":{"type":"string"},"firstName":{"type":"string"},"middleInitial":{"type":"string"},"city":{"type":"string"},"countryCode":{"type":"string"},"zipCodePlus4":{"type":"string"},"addressLine1":{"type":"string"},"stateOrProvinceCode":{"ty
